welcome_message_body: Welcome to Forest Acres, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant community, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Airport is the central hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Metropolitan Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Metropolitan Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Owens Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Owens Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
